title: Megaport to Offer Direct Access to Microsoft Azure ExpressRoute in the U.S.
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 1:40 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Megaport 
SAN FRANCISCO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Megaport , a global leader in SDN-based elastic interconnection, today announced that it has expanded its alliance with Microsoft Corp., enabling Azure ExpressRoute to directly integrate with Megaport in the United States. The expansion reflects the strong relationship between the two companies, resulting from the strong sales traction already exhibited from the integration of Azure on the Megaport Fabric in Australia. With this new development, customers can directly connect to any Megaport-enabled data center in the U.S. for direct access to Azure ExpressRoute. 
As the pioneer of the first SDN-enabled interconnection fabric, Megaport is well equipped to support this expansion and enable Azure ExpressRoute connectivity to a broader range of networks and enterprises. Any customer connected to any Megaport-enabled data center in the U.S. will be able to provision services into Azure ExpressRoute in seconds. Megaport offers a truly neutral elastic cloud interconnection solution that spans multiple diverse data centers across the United States. 
Established in Australia in 2013, Megaport is changing the way cloud and network services are consumed and has created a model that allows for right-sizing capacity. Megaport’s award-winning customer portal enables services and users to connect over an elastic, SDN-based, ubiquitous Ethernet fabric, allowing wider coverage and faster speed to market while reducing costs and enabling real-time provisioning across one platform. 
“We are absolutely thrilled to work alongside Azure ExpressRoute in the United States. We are looking forward to offering the Azure ExpressRoute solution to our U.S. enterprise customers, replicating the success that we had in Australia,” said Brynn Maddux, EVP, Americas, Megaport. “We will be offering dedicated Layer 2 connectivity into Azure ExpressRoute from every connected datacenter in our ecosystem. Through Megaport’s award-winning customer portal, companies will have the ability to scale massive bandwidth into Azure ExpressRoute in a matter of seconds.” 
“We’re pleased to have Megaport as an ExpressRoute partner in the United States," says Ross Ortega, Principal Product Manager, Networking, Microsoft Azure. "With Megaport’s service offering, enterprises will have on-demand access to Azure in both markets.” 
To learn more about Megaport’s SDN-based interconnection fabric, please visit https://megaport.com or watch the video .

About Megaport 
Megaport is the global leader and pioneer in elastic interconnection. Established in 2013 and founded by Bevan Slattery, Megaport built the world’s first SDN-based neutral elastic fabric changing the way enterprises, networks, and services interconnect. The high demand for interconnects and the need to change the way bandwidth acquisition has pushed Megaport into new markets globally with full integration into the U.S. market expected by the end of 2015. Megaport has been built by a highly experienced team with extensive knowledge in building large scale global carrier networks. To learn more about Megaport, please visit: www.megaport.com .
